author: Source: San Gabriel Valley Tribune
title: Cirque du Soleil a Kuriosa makes the impossible possible - San Gabriel Valley Tribune
text:
Fresh from the Seeker's cabinet come these deep-sea creatures in a stunning, fast-paced and fluid contortion act. Photo credit: Martin Girard shootstudio.ca When Michel Laprise set out to create the steampunk spectacle “Kurios: Cabinet of Curiosities,” he drew up a list of elements typical of all Cirque du Soleil shows.
Start the conversation, or Read more at San Gabriel Valley Tribune.
